00012 #ifndef PARNI_H_
00013 #define PARNI_H_
00014 
00015 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00016  * Parni is a Monte-Carlo integrating class, which uses an adaptive grid with  *
00017  * unequal spacings. When calling the update method, the bin weights are       *
00018  * updated, and when the adapt method is called, the highest-weight bin is     *
00019  * split, approximating the integrand optimally.                               *
00020  *                                                                             *
00021  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00022 
00023 #include <set>
00024 #include <Camgen/logging.h>
00025 #include <Camgen/MC_obj_gen.h>
00026 #include <Camgen/parni_it.h>
00027 
00028 namespace Camorra
00029 {
00031 
00032     template<class value_t,std::size_t D,class rng_t,class key_t>class parni: public MC_object_generator<value_t,typename parni_bin<value_t,D,rng_t,key_t>::point_type,1,true>
00033     {
00034         /* Type definitions: */
00035 
00036         typedef MC_object_generator<value_t,typename parni_bin<value_t,D,rng_t>::point_type,1,true> base_type;
00037 
00038         public:
00039 
00040             typedef value_t value_type;
00041             typedef random_number_stream<value_t,rng_t> rn_stream;
00042             typedef std::size_t size_type;
00043             typedef parni_bin<value_t,D,rng_t,key_t> bin_type;
00044             typedef typename bin_type::point_type point_type;
00045             typedef typename bin_type::bin_iterator bin_iterator;
00046             typedef typename bin_type::const_bin_iterator const_bin_iterator;
00047             typedef typename bin_type::reverse_bin_iterator reverse_bin_iterator;
00048             typedef typename bin_type::const_reverse_bin_iterator const_reverse_bin_iterator;
00049             typedef typename bin_type::leaf_iterator leaf_iterator;
00050             typedef typename bin_type::const_leaf_iterator const_leaf_iterator;
00051             typedef typename bin_type::reverse_leaf_iterator reverse_leaf_iterator;
00052             typedef typename bin_type::const_reverse_leaf_iterator const_reverse_leaf_iterator;
00053 
00054             /* Static methods: */
00055             /*-----------------*/
00056 
00058 
00059             static bool accept(const value_type& f)
00060             {
00061                 if(f==f and f!=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity() and !(f<(value_type)0))
00062                 {
00063                     return true;
00064                 }
00065                 LOG(warning)<<"Integrand "<<f<<" was not accepted by parni..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00066                 return false;
00067             }
00068 
00070 
00071             static parni<value_t,D,rng_t,key_t>* create_instance(std::istream& is)
00072             {
00073                 std::string initflag;
00074                 do
00075                 {
00076                     std::getline(is,initflag);
00077                 }
00078                 while(initflag!="<parni>" and !is.eof());
00079                 if(is.eof())
00080                 {
00081                     LOG(warning)<<"End of file reached before initial data are read..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00082                     return NULL;
00083                 }
00084                 size_type dim;
00085                 is>>dim;
00086                 if(dim!=D)
00087                 {
00088                     LOG(warning)<<"Incorrect dimension read from input stream...aborting load."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00089                     std::string endflag;
00090                     do
00091                     {
00092                         std::getline(is,endflag);
00093                     }
00094                     while(endflag!="</parni>" and !is.eof());
00095                     return NULL;
00096                 }
00097                 size_type n_bins_;
00098                 is>>n_bins_;
00099                 unsigned int mode_;
00100                 is>>mode_;
00101                 parni<value_t,D,rng_t,key_t>* result=new parni<value_t,D,rng_t,key_t>(n_bins_,static_cast<grid_modes>(mode_));
00102                 result->load(is);
00103                 if(result->bins.size()!=0)
00104                 {
00105                     std::string endflag;
00106                     do
00107                     {
00108                         std::getline(is,endflag);
00109                     }
00110                     while(endflag!="</parni>" and !is.eof());
00111                     return result;
00112                 }
00113                 delete result;
00114                 std::string endflag;
00115                 do
00116                 {
00117                     std::getline(is,endflag);
00118                 }
00119                 while(endflag!="</parni>" and !is.eof());
00120                 return NULL;
00121             }
00122 
00125 
00126             static parni<value_t,D,rng_t,key_t>* create_instance(point_type* point_,std::istream& is)
00127             {
00128                 std::string initflag;
00129                 do
00130                 {
00131                     std::getline(is,initflag);
00132                 }
00133                 while(initflag!="<parni>" and !is.eof());
00134                 if(is.eof())
00135                 {
00136                     LOG(warning)<<"End of file reached before initial data are read..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00137                     return NULL;
00138                 }
00139                 size_type dim;
00140                 is>>dim;
00141                 if(dim!=D)
00142                 {
00143                     LOG(warning)<<"Incorrect dimension read from input stream...aborting load."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00144                     std::string endflag;
00145                     do
00146                     {
00147                         std::getline(is,endflag);
00148                     }
00149                     while(endflag!="</parni>" and !is.eof());
00150                     return NULL;
00151                 }
00152                 size_type n_bins_;
00153                 is>>n_bins_;
00154                 unsigned int mode_;
00155                 is>>mode_;
00156                 parni<value_t,D,rng_t,key_t>* result=new parni<value_t,D,rng_t,key_t>(point_,n_bins_,static_cast<grid_modes>(mode_));
00157                 result->load(is);
00158                 if(result->root_bin!=NULL)
00159                 {
00160                     std::string endflag;
00161                     do
00162                     {
00163                         std::getline(is,endflag);
00164                     }
00165                     while(endflag!="</parni>" and !is.eof());
00166                     return result;
00167                 }
00168                 delete result;
00169                 std::string endflag;
00170                 do
00171                 {
00172                     std::getline(is,endflag);
00173                 }
00174                 while(endflag!="</parni>" and !is.eof());
00175                 return NULL;
00176             }

00192             /* Public constructors: */

00194             
00195             parni(const point_type& xmin_,const point_type& xmax_,size_type n_bins_=500,grid_modes mode_=cumulant_weights):n_bins(n_bins_),mode(mode_),xmin(xmin_),xmax(xmax_),root_bin(NULL),reg_bin(root_bin)
00196             {
00197                 vector<key_t,D>key;
00198                 key.assign(1);
00199                 root_bin=new bin_type(&xmin,&xmax,key,mode);
00200             }
00201 
00205             
00206             parni(point_type* point_,const point_type& xmin_,const point_type& xmax_,size_type n_bins_=500,grid_modes mode_=cumulant_weights):base_type(point_),n_bins(n_bins_),mode(mode_),xmin(xmin_),xmax(xmax_),root_bin(NULL),reg_bin(root_bin)
00207             {
00208                 vector<key_t,D>key;
00209                 key.assign(1);
00210                 root_bin=new bin_type(&xmin,&xmax,key,mode);
00211             }

00218             ~parni()
00219             {
00220                 delete root_bin;
00221             }
00222 
00223             /* Public modifiers: */
00224             /*-------------------*/
00225 
00227 
00228             bool generate()
00229             {
00230                 value_type rho=rn_stream::throw_number(0,root_bin->w);
00231                 reg_bin=root_bin->find_weight(rho);
00232                 if(reg_bin->generate(this->object()))
00233                 {
00234                     this->weight()=reg_bin->weight()*norm();
00235                     return true;
00236                 }
00237                 this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00238                 return false;
00239             }
00240 
00242 
00243             bool evaluate_weight()
00244             {
00245                 reg_bin=root_bin->find_point(this->object());
00246                 if(reg_bin==NULL)
00247                 {
00248                     return false;
00249                 }
00250                 this->weight()=reg_bin->weight()*norm();
00251                 return true;
00252             }
00253 
00255 
00256             void update()
00257             {
00258                 if(reg_bin==NULL)
00259                 {
00260                     return;
00261                 }
00262                 if(accept(this->integrand()))
00263                 {
00264                     reg_bin->update(this->object(),this->integrand());
00265                 }
00266             }
00267 
00269 
00270             void adapt()
00271             {
00272                 root_bin->adapt();
00273                 if(!final())
00274                 {
00275                     std::vector<bin_type*>selection;
00276                     value_type maxw(0),w;
00277                     for(leaf_iterator it=begin_leaves();it!=end_leaves();++it)
00278                     {
00279                         w=(*it)->w;
00280                         if(maxw<w)
00281                         {
00282                             selection.resize(1);
00283                             selection[0]=*it;
00284                             maxw=w;
00285                         }
00286                         else if(maxw==w)
00287                         {
00288                             selection.push_back(*it);
00289                         }
00290                     }
00291                     if(selection.size()==1)
00292                     {
00293                         selection[0]->split();
00294                     }
00295                     else if(selection.size()>1)
00296                     {
00297                         selection[rn_stream::throw_dice(selection.size())]->split();
00298                     }
00299                 }
00300                 else
00301                 {
00302                     std::vector<bin_type*>min_selection,max_selection;
00303                     value_type maxw(0),minw(std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity()),w;
00304                     for(leaf_iterator it=begin_leaves();it!=end_leaves();++it)
00305                     {
00306                         w=(*it)->w;
00307                         if(maxw<w)
00308                         {
00309                             max_selection.resize(1);
00310                             max_selection[0]=*it;
00311                             maxw=w;
00312                         }
00313                         else if(maxw==w)
00314                         {
00315                             max_selection.push_back(*it);
00316                         }
00317                         w=(*it)->parent->w;
00318                         if(minw>w)
00319                         {
00320                             min_selection.resize(1);
00321                             min_selection[0]=(*it)->parent;
00322                             minw=w;
00323                         }
00324                         else if(minw==w)
00325                         {
00326                             min_selection.push_back(*it);
00327                         }
00328                     }
00329                     bin_type* minb;
00330                     if(min_selection.size()==1)
00331                     {
00332                         minb=min_selection[0];
00333                     }
00334                     else if(min_selection.size()>1)
00335                     {
00336                         minb=min_selection[rn_stream::throw_dice(min_selection.size())];
00337                     }
00338                     else
00339                     {
00340                         return;
00341                     }
00342                     bin_type* maxb;
00343                     if(max_selection.size()==1)
00344                     {
00345                         maxb=max_selection[0];
00346                     }
00347                     else if(max_selection.size()>1)
00348                     {
00349                         maxb=max_selection[rn_stream::throw_dice(max_selection.size())];
00350                     }
00351                     else
00352                     {
00353                         return;
00354                     }
00355                     if(!(minb==maxb or maxb->is_child_of(minb)))
00356                     {
00357                         if(reg_bin==NULL or reg_bin->is_child_of(minb))
00358                         {
00359                             reg_bin=minb;
00360                         }
00361                         minb->merge();
00362                         maxb->split();
00363                         if(reg_bin==maxb)
00364                         {
00365                             reg_bin=rn_stream::throw_coin()?(maxb->child1):(maxb->child2);
00366                         }
00367                     }
00368                 }
00369             }
00370 
00373 
00374             void reset()
00375             {
00376                 this->base_type::reset();
00377                 root_bin->reset();
00378             }
00379

00386             {
00387                 return (root_bin->count_bins()>=n_bins);
00388             }
00389 
00391

00400             {

00402             }
00403 
00405 
00406             const value_type& norm() const
00407             {
00408                 return root_bin->w;
00409             }
00410 
00412 
00413             std::ostream& print(std::ostream& os) const
00414             {
00415                 for(const_bin_iterator it=begin_bins();it!=end_bins();++it)
00416                 {
00417                     os<<(**it)<<std::endl;
00418                 }
00419                 return os;
00420             }
00421 
00423 
00424             std::ostream& print_leaves(std::ostream& os) const
00425             {
00426                 for(const_leaf_iterator it=begin_leaves();it!=end_leaves();++it)
00427                 {
00428                     os<<(**it)<<std::endl;
00429                 }
00430                 return os;
00431             }
00432 
00434 
00435             plot_script* print_rectangles(plot_script* ps) const
00436             {
00437                 for(const_leaf_iterator it=begin_leaves();it!=end_leaves();++it)
00438                 {
00439                     (*it)->print_rectangle(ps);
00440                 }
00441                 return ps;
00442             }
00443 
00444             /* Serialization: */
00445             /*----------------*/
00446 
00448 
00449             std::istream& load(std::istream& is)
00450             {
00451                 this->MC_generator<value_t>::load(is);
00452                 for(size_type i=0;i<D;++i)
00453                 {
00454                     safe_read(is,xmin[i]);
00455                 }
00456                 for(size_type i=0;i<D;++i)
00457                 {
00458                     safe_read(is,xmax[i]);
00459                 }
00460                 bin_type* root_bin_=bin_type::create_instance(is,&xmin,&xmax,mode);
00461                 if(root_bin_!=NULL)
00462                 {
00463                     delete root_bin;
00464                     root_bin=root_bin_;
00465                 }
00466                 reg_bin=root_bin;
00467                 return is;
00468             }
00469 
00471 
00472             std::ostream& save(std::ostream& os) const
00473             {
00474                 os<<"<parni>"<<std::endl;
00475                 os<<D<<"\t"<<n_bins<<"\t"<<static_cast<unsigned int>(mode)<<std::endl;
00476                 this->MC_generator<value_t>::save(os);
00477                 for(size_type i=0;i<D;++i)
00478                 {
00479                     safe_write(os,xmin[i]);
00480                     os<<"\t";
00481                 }
00482                 os<<std::endl;
00483                 for(size_type i=0;i<D;++i)
00484                 {
00485                     safe_write(os,xmax[i]);
00486                     os<<"\t";
00487                 }
00488                 os<<std::endl;
00489                 root_bin->save(os);
00490                 os<<"</parni>"<<std::endl;
00491                 return os;
00492             }

00542             {

00544             }

00547                 return root_bin->end_bins();
00548             }

00550             {
00551                 return const_cast<const bin_type*>(root_bin)->end_bins();
00552             }
00553             reverse_bin_iterator rend_bins()
00554             {
00555                 return root_bin->rend_bins();
00556             }
00557             const_reverse_bin_iterator rend_bins() const
00558             {
00559                 return const_cast<const bin_type*>(root_bin)->rend_bins();
00560             }
00561 
00562             void check()
00563             {
00564                 for(bin_iterator it=begin_bins();it!=end_bins();++it)
00565                 {
00566                     if(!(*it)->is_leaf())
00567                     {
00568                         if((*it)->volume()!=((*it)->child1->volume()+(*it)->child2->volume()))
00569                         {
00570                             LOG(warning)<<"Bin \n"<<**it<<"\n has volume unequal to the sum of its childs \n"<<(*(*it)->child1)<<"\n"<<(*(*it)->child2)<<ENDLOG(warning);
00571                         }
00572                         if((*it)->F0!=((*it)->child1->F0+(*it)->child2->F0))
00573                         {
00574                             LOG(warning)<<"Bin \n"<<**it<<"\n has F0 unequal to the sum of its childs \n"<<(*(*it)->child1)<<"\n"<<(*(*it)->child2)<<ENDLOG(warning);
00575                         }
00576                         if((*it)->w!=((*it)->child1->w+(*it)->child2->w))
00577                         {
00578                             LOG(warning)<<"Bin \n"<<**it<<"\n has weight unequal to the sum of its childs \n"<<(*(*it)->child1)<<"\n"<<(*(*it)->child2)<<ENDLOG(warning);
00579                         }
00580                     }
00581                 }
00582                 for(leaf_iterator it=begin_leaves();it!=end_leaves();++it)
00583                 {
00584                     if(!(*it)->is_leaf())
00585                     {
00586                         LOG(warning)<<"Leaf iterator \n"<<*it<<"\n is not a leaf bin..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00587                     }
00588                 }
00589                 value_type w=this->weight();
00590                 evaluate_weight();
00591                 if(w!=this->weight())
00592                 {
00593                     LOG(warning)<<"Re-evaluated weight "<<this->weight()<<" not equal to original "<<w<<ENDLOG(warning);
00594                 }
00595             }
00596 
00597         private:
00598             
00599             /* Integration domain: */
00600             
00601             point_type xmin,xmax;
00602 
00603             /* Root of the binary tree of bins: */
00604 
00605             bin_type* root_bin;
00606             
00607             /* Register bin, which has thrown the last point: */
00608             
00609             bin_type* reg_bin;
00610 
00611             /* Sub-grid register: */
00612 
00613             std::set<parni_sub_grid<value_t,1,rng_t,key_t>*>subgrids;
00614 
00615             /* Private constructors: */
00616             /*-----------------------*/
00617 
00618             /* Default constructor: */
00619 
00620             parni(size_type n_bins_,grid_modes mode_=cumulant_weights):n_bins(n_bins_),mode(mode_),root_bin(NULL),reg_bin(NULL){}
00621 
00622             /* Constructor with point argument: */
00623 
00624             parni(point_type* point_,size_type n_bins_,grid_modes mode_=cumulant_weights):base_type(point_),n_bins(n_bins_),mode(mode_),root_bin(NULL),reg_bin(NULL){}
00625 
00626             /* Private methods: */
00627             /*------------------*/
00628 
00629             /* Returns the lowest-level bin containing the argument point: */
00630 
00631             bin_type* find_leaf(const point_type& x)
00632             {
00633                 return root_bin->find_point(x);
00634             }
00635 
00636             /* Returns the lowest-level bin containing the argument point and
00637              * sets the second argument to the corresponding left-integral: */
00638 
00639             bin_type* find_leaf(const point_type& x,value_type& s)
00640             {
00641                 s=(value_type)0;
00642                 return root_bin->find_point(x,s);
00643             }
00644 
00645             /* Registers a subgrid: */
00646 
00647             void register_sub_grid(parni_sub_grid<value_t,1,rng_t,key_t>* subgrid)
00648             {
00649                 if(subgrid->grid==this)
00650                 {
00651                     subgrids.insert(subgrid);
00652                 }
00653             }
00654 
00655             /* Unregisters a subgrid: */
00656 
00657             void unregister_sub_grid(parni_sub_grid<value_t,1,rng_t,key_t>* subgrid)
00658             {
00659                 if(subgrid->grid==this)
00660                 {
00661                     subgrids.erase(subgrid);
00662                 }
00663             }
00664     };
00665 
00667 
00668     template<class value_t,class rng_t,class key_t>class parni<value_t,1,rng_t,key_t>: public MC_object_generator<value_t,typename parni_bin<value_t,1,rng_t,key_t>::point_type,1,true>
00669     {
00670         friend class parni_sub_grid<value_t,1,rng_t,key_t>;
00671 
00672         /* Type definitions: */
00673 
00674         typedef MC_object_generator<value_t,typename parni_bin<value_t,1,rng_t,key_t>::point_type,1,true> base_type;
00675 
00676         public:
00677 
00678             typedef value_t value_type;
00679             typedef random_number_stream<value_t,rng_t> rn_stream;
00680             typedef std::size_t size_type;
00681             typedef parni_bin<value_t,1,rng_t,key_t> bin_type;
00682             typedef typename bin_type::point_type point_type;
00683             typedef typename bin_type::bin_iterator bin_iterator;
00684             typedef typename bin_type::const_bin_iterator const_bin_iterator;
00685             typedef typename bin_type::reverse_bin_iterator reverse_bin_iterator;
00686             typedef typename bin_type::const_reverse_bin_iterator const_reverse_bin_iterator;
00687             typedef typename bin_type::leaf_iterator leaf_iterator;
00688             typedef typename bin_type::const_leaf_iterator const_leaf_iterator;
00689             typedef typename bin_type::reverse_leaf_iterator reverse_leaf_iterator;
00690             typedef typename bin_type::const_reverse_leaf_iterator const_reverse_leaf_iterator;
00691 
00692             /* Static methods: */
00693             /*-----------------*/
00694 
00696 
00697             static bool accept(const value_type& f)
00698             {
00699                 if(f==f and f!=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity() and !(f<(value_type)0))
00700                 {
00701                     return true;
00702                 }
00703                 LOG(warning)<<"Integrand "<<f<<" was not accepted by parni..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00704                 return false;
00705             }
00706 
00708 
00709             static parni<value_t,1,rng_t,key_t>* create_instance(std::istream& is)
00710             {
00711                 std::string initflag;
00712                 do
00713                 {
00714                     std::getline(is,initflag);
00715                 }
00716                 while(initflag!="<parni>" and !is.eof());
00717                 if(is.eof())
00718                 {
00719                     LOG(warning)<<"End of file reached before initial data are read..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00720                     return NULL;
00721                 }
00722                 size_type dim;
00723                 is>>dim;
00724                 if(dim!=1)
00725                 {
00726                     LOG(warning)<<"Incorrect dimension read from input stream...aborting load."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00727                     std::string endflag;
00728                     do
00729                     {
00730                         std::getline(is,endflag);
00731                     }
00732                     while(endflag!="</parni>" and !is.eof());
00733                     return NULL;
00734                 }
00735                 size_type n_bins_;
00736                 is>>n_bins_;
00737                 unsigned int mode_;
00738                 is>>mode_;
00739                 parni<value_t,1,rng_t,key_t>* result=new parni<value_t,1,rng_t,key_t>(n_bins_,static_cast<grid_modes>(mode_));
00740                 result->load(is);
00741                 if(result->bins.size()!=0)
00742                 {
00743                     std::string endflag;
00744                     do
00745                     {
00746                         std::getline(is,endflag);
00747                     }
00748                     while(endflag!="</parni>" and !is.eof());
00749                     return result;
00750                 }
00751                 delete result;
00752                 std::string endflag;
00753                 do
00754                 {
00755                     std::getline(is,endflag);
00756                 }
00757                 while(endflag!="</parni>" and !is.eof());
00758                 return NULL;
00759             }
00760 
00763 
00764             static parni<value_t,1,rng_t,key_t>* create_instance(point_type* point_,std::istream& is)
00765             {
00766                 std::string initflag;
00767                 do
00768                 {
00769                     std::getline(is,initflag);
00770                 }
00771                 while(initflag!="<parni>" and !is.eof());
00772                 if(is.eof())
00773                 {
00774                     LOG(warning)<<"End of file reached before initial data are read..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00775                     return NULL;
00776                 }
00777                 size_type dim;
00778                 is>>dim;
00779                 if(dim!=1)
00780                 {
00781                     LOG(warning)<<"Incorrect dimension read from input stream...aborting load."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00782                     std::string endflag;
00783                     do
00784                     {
00785                         std::getline(is,endflag);
00786                     }
00787                     while(endflag!="</parni>" and !is.eof());
00788                     return NULL;
00789                 }
00790                 size_type n_bins_;
00791                 is>>n_bins_;
00792                 unsigned int mode_;
00793                 is>>mode_;
00794                 parni<value_t,1,rng_t,key_t>* result=new parni<value_t,1,rng_t,key_t>(point_,n_bins_,static_cast<grid_modes>(mode_));
00795                 result->load(is);
00796                 if(result->root_bin!=NULL)
00797                 {
00798                     std::string endflag;
00799                     do
00800                     {
00801                         std::getline(is,endflag);
00802                     }
00803                     while(endflag!="</parni>" and !is.eof());
00804                     return result;
00805                 }
00806                 delete result;
00807                 std::string endflag;
00808                 do
00809                 {
00810                     std::getline(is,endflag);
00811                 }
00812                 while(endflag!="</parni>" and !is.eof());
00813                 return NULL;
00814             }

00830             /* Public constructors: */
00831             /*----------------------*/
00832             
00833             parni(const point_type& xmin_,const point_type& xmax_,size_type n_bins_=500,grid_modes mode_=cumulant_weights):n_bins(n_bins_),mode(mode_),xmin(xmin_),xmax(xmax_),root_bin(new bin_type(&xmin,&xmax,1,mode)),reg_bin(root_bin){}
00834 
00838             
00839             parni(point_type* point_,const point_type& xmin_,const point_type& xmax_,size_type n_bins_=500,grid_modes mode_=cumulant_weights):base_type(point_),n_bins(n_bins_),mode(mode_),xmin(xmin_),xmax(xmax_),root_bin(new bin_type(&xmin,&xmax,1,mode)),reg_bin(root_bin){}

00842             /*-------------*/
00843 
00845 
00846             ~parni()
00847             {
00848                 delete root_bin;
00849                 for(typename std::set<parni_sub_grid<value_t,1,rng_t,key_t>*>::iterator it=subgrids.begin();it!=subgrids.end();++it)
00850                 {
00851                     (*it)->grid=NULL;
00852                 }
00853             }
00854 
00855             /* Public modifiers: */
00856             /*-------------------*/
00857 
00859 
00860             bool generate()
00861             {
00862                 value_type rho=rn_stream::throw_number(0,root_bin->w);
00863                 reg_bin=root_bin->find_weight(rho);
00864                 if(reg_bin->generate(this->object()))
00865                 {
00866                     this->weight()=reg_bin->weight()*norm();
00867                     return true;
00868                 }
00869                 this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00870                 return false;
00871             }
00872 
00874 
00875             bool evaluate_weight()
00876             {
00877                 reg_bin=root_bin->find_point(this->object());
00878                 if(reg_bin==NULL)
00879                 {
00880                     return false;
00881                 }
00882                 this->weight()=reg_bin->weight()*norm();
00883                 return true;
00884             }
00885 
00887 
00888             void update()
00889             {
00890                 if(reg_bin==NULL)
00891                 {
00892                     return;
00893                 }
00894                 if(accept(this->integrand()))
00895                 {
00896                     reg_bin->update(this->object(),this->integrand());
00897                 }
00898                 for(typename std::set<parni_sub_grid<value_t,1,rng_t,key_t>*>::iterator it=subgrids.begin();it!=subgrids.end();++it)
00899                 {
00900                     (*it)->refresh_bounds();
00901                 }
00902             }
00903 
00905             
00906             void adapt()
00907             {
00908                 root_bin->adapt();
00909                 if(!final())
00910                 {
00911                     std::vector<bin_type*>selection;
00912                     value_type maxw(0),w;
00913                     for(leaf_iterator it=begin_leaves();it!=end_leaves();++it)
00914                     {
00915                         w=(*it)->w;
00916                         if(maxw<w)
00917                         {
00918                             selection.resize(1);
00919                             selection[0]=*it;
00920                             maxw=w;
00921                         }
00922                         else if(maxw==w)
00923                         {
00924                             selection.push_back(*it);
00925                         }
00926                     }
00927                     if(selection.size()==1)
00928                     {
00929                         selection[0]->split();
00930                     }
00931                     else if(selection.size()>1)
00932                     {
00933                         selection[rn_stream::throw_dice(selection.size())]->split();
00934                     }
00935                 }
00936                 else
00937                 {
00938                     std::vector<bin_type*>min_selection,max_selection;
00939                     value_type maxw(0),minw(std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity()),w;
00940                     for(leaf_iterator it=begin_leaves();it!=end_leaves();++it)
00941                     {
00942                         w=(*it)->w;
00943                         if(maxw<w)
00944                         {
00945                             max_selection.resize(1);
00946                             max_selection[0]=*it;
00947                             maxw=w;
00948                         }
00949                         else if(maxw==w)
00950                         {
00951                             max_selection.push_back(*it);
00952                         }
00953                         w=(*it)->parent->w;
00954                         if(minw>w)
00955                         {
00956                             min_selection.resize(1);
00957                             min_selection[0]=(*it)->parent;
00958                             minw=w;
00959                         }
00960                         else if(minw==w)
00961                         {
00962                             min_selection.push_back((*it)->parent);
00963                         }
00964                     }
00965                     bin_type* minb;
00966                     if(min_selection.size()==1)
00967                     {
00968                         minb=min_selection[0];
00969                     }
00970                     else if(min_selection.size()>1)
00971                     {
00972                         minb=min_selection[rn_stream::throw_dice(min_selection.size())];
00973                     }
00974                     else
00975                     {
00976                         return;
00977                     }
00978                     bin_type* maxb;
00979                     if(max_selection.size()==1)
00980                     {
00981                         maxb=max_selection[0];
00982                     }
00983                     else if(max_selection.size()>1)
00984                     {
00985                         maxb=max_selection[rn_stream::throw_dice(max_selection.size())];
00986                     }
00987                     else
00988                     {
00989                         return;
00990                     }
00991                     if(!(minb==maxb or maxb->is_child_of(minb)))
00992                     {
00993                         if(reg_bin==NULL or reg_bin->is_child_of(minb))
00994                         {
00995                             reg_bin=minb;
00996                         }
00997                         minb->merge();
00998                         maxb->split();
00999                         if(reg_bin==maxb)
01000                         {
01001                             reg_bin=rn_stream::throw_coin()?(maxb->child1):(maxb->child2);
01002                         }
01003                     }
01004                 }
01005                 for(typename std::set<parni_sub_grid<value_t,1,rng_t,key_t>*>::iterator it=subgrids.begin();it!=subgrids.end();++it)
01006                 {
01007                     (*it)->refresh_bounds();
01008                 }
01009             }
01010 
01012 
01013             void adapt(const point_type& a,const point_type& b)
01014             {
01015                 root_bin->adapt();
01016                 if(!final())
01017                 {
01018                     std::vector<bin_type*>selection;
01019                     value_type maxw(0),w;
01020                     for(leaf_iterator it=begin_leaves();it!=end_leaves();++it)
01021                     {
01022                         if((*it)->upper_bound()<a or (*it)->lower_bound()>b)
01023                         {
01024                             continue;
01025                         }
01026                         w=(*it)->w;
01027                         if(maxw<w)
01028                         {
01029                             selection.resize(1);
01030                             selection[0]=*it;
01031                             maxw=w;
01032                         }
01033                         else if(maxw==w)
01034                         {
01035                             selection.push_back(*it);
01036                         }
01037                     }
01038                     if(selection.size()==1)
01039                     {
01040                         selection[0]->split();
01041                     }
01042                     else if(selection.size()>1)
01043                     {
01044                         selection[rn_stream::throw_dice(selection.size())]->split();
01045                     }
01046                 }
01047                 else
01048                 {
01049                     std::vector<bin_type*>min_selection,max_selection;
01050                     value_type maxw(0),minw(std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity()),w;
01051                     for(leaf_iterator it=begin_leaves();it!=end_leaves();++it)
01052                     {
01053                         if((*it)->upper_bound()<a or (*it)->lower_bound()>b)
01054                         {
01055                             continue;
01056                         }
01057                         w=(*it)->w;
01058                         if(maxw<w)
01059                         {
01060                             max_selection.resize(1);
01061                             max_selection[0]=*it;
01062                             maxw=w;
01063                         }
01064                         else if(maxw==w)
01065                         {
01066                             max_selection.push_back(*it);
01067                         }
01068                         w=(*it)->parent->w;
01069                         if(minw>w)
01070                         {
01071                             min_selection.resize(1);
01072                             min_selection[0]=(*it)->parent;
01073                             minw=w;
01074                         }
01075                         else if(minw==w)
01076                         {
01077                             min_selection.push_back((*it)->parent);
01078                         }
01079                     }
01080                     bin_type* minb;
01081                     if(min_selection.size()==1)
01082                     {
01083                         minb=min_selection[0];
01084                     }
01085                     else if(min_selection.size()>1)
01086                     {
01087                         minb=min_selection[rn_stream::throw_dice(min_selection.size())];
01088                     }
01089                     else
01090                     {
01091                         return;
01092                     }
01093                     bin_type* maxb;
01094                     if(max_selection.size()==1)
01095                     {
01096                         maxb=max_selection[0];
01097                     }
01098                     else if(max_selection.size()>1)
01099                     {
01100                         maxb=max_selection[rn_stream::throw_dice(max_selection.size())];
01101                     }
01102                     else
01103                     {
01104                         return;
01105                     }
01106                     if(!(minb==maxb or maxb->is_child_of(minb)))
01107                     {
01108                         if(reg_bin==NULL or reg_bin->is_child_of(minb))
01109                         {
01110                             reg_bin=minb;
01111                         }
01112                         minb->merge();
01113                         maxb->split();
01114                         if(reg_bin==maxb)
01115                         {
01116                             reg_bin=rn_stream::throw_coin()?(maxb->child1):(maxb->child2);
01117                         }
01118                     }
01119                 }
01120                 for(typename std::set<parni_sub_grid<value_t,1,rng_t,key_t>*>::iterator it=subgrids.begin();it!=subgrids.end();++it)
01121                 {
01122                     (*it)->refresh_bounds();
01123                 }
01124             }

01141             {
01142                 return (root_bin->count_bins()>=n_bins);
01143             }

01170                 for(const_bin_iterator it=begin_bins();it!=end_bins();++it)

01198 
01199             /* Serialization: */
01200             /*----------------*/
01201 
01203 
01204             std::istream& load(std::istream& is)
01205             {
01206                 this->MC_generator<value_t>::load(is);
01207                 safe_read(is,xmin);
01208                 safe_read(is,xmax);
01209                 bin_type* root_bin_=bin_type::create_instance(is,&xmin,&xmax,mode);
01210                 if(root_bin_!=NULL)
01211                 {
01212                     delete root_bin;
01213                     root_bin=root_bin_;
01214                 }
01215                 reg_bin=root_bin;
01216                 return is;
01217             }
01218 
01220 
01221             std::ostream& save(std::ostream& os) const
01222             {
01223                 os<<"<parni>"<<std::endl;
01224                 os<<"1\t"<<n_bins<<"\t"<<static_cast<unsigned int>(mode)<<std::endl;
01225                 this->MC_generator<value_t>::save(os);
01226                 safe_write(os,xmin);
01227                 os<<"\t";
01228                 safe_write(os,xmax);
01229                 os<<std::endl;
01230                 root_bin->save(os);
01231                 os<<"</parni>"<<std::endl;
01232                 return os;
01233             }

01302 
01303             void check()
01304             {
01305                 for(bin_iterator it=begin_bins();it!=end_bins();++it)
01306                 {
01307                     if(!(*it)->is_leaf())
01308                     {
01309                         if((*it)->volume()!=((*it)->child1->volume()+(*it)->child2->volume()))
01310                         {
01311                             LOG(warning)<<"Bin \n"<<**it<<"\n has volume unequal to the sum of its childs \n"<<(*(*it)->child1)<<"\n"<<(*(*it)->child2)<<ENDLOG(warning);
01312                         }
01313                         if((*it)->F0!=((*it)->child1->F0+(*it)->child2->F0))
01314                         {
01315                             LOG(warning)<<"Bin \n"<<**it<<"\n has F0 unequal to the sum of its childs \n"<<(*(*it)->child1)<<"\n"<<(*(*it)->child2)<<ENDLOG(warning);
01316                         }
01317                         if((*it)->w!=((*it)->child1->w+(*it)->child2->w))
01318                         {
01319                             LOG(warning)<<"Bin \n"<<**it<<"\n has weight unequal to the sum of its childs \n"<<(*(*it)->child1)<<"\n"<<(*(*it)->child2)<<ENDLOG(warning);
01320                         }
01321                     }
01322                 }
01323                 for(leaf_iterator it=begin_leaves();it!=end_leaves();++it)
01324                 {
01325                     if(!(*it)->is_leaf())
01326                     {
01327                         LOG(warning)<<"Leaf iterator \n"<<*it<<"\n is not a leaf bin..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
01328                     }
01329                 }
01330                 value_type w=this->weight();
01331                 evaluate_weight();
01332                 if(w!=this->weight())
01333                 {
01334                     LOG(warning)<<"Re-evaluated weight "<<this->weight()<<" not equal to original "<<w<<ENDLOG(warning);
01335                 }
01336             }

01339             
01340             /* Integration domain: */
01341             
01342             point_type xmin,xmax;
01343 
01344             /* Root of the binary tree of bins: */
01345 
01346             bin_type* root_bin;
01347             
01348             /* Register bin, which has thrown the last point: */
01349             
01350             bin_type* reg_bin;
01351 
01352             /* Sub-grid register: */
01353 
01354             std::set<parni_sub_grid<value_t,1,rng_t,key_t>*>subgrids;
01355 
01356             /* Private constructors: */

01359             /* Default constructor: */
01360 
01361             parni(size_type n_bins_,grid_modes mode_=cumulant_weights):n_bins(n_bins_),mode(mode_),root_bin(NULL),reg_bin(NULL){}
01362 
01363             /* Constructor with point argument: */
01364 
01365             parni(point_type* point_,size_type n_bins_,grid_modes mode_=cumulant_weights):base_type(point_),n_bins(n_bins_),mode(mode_),root_bin(NULL),reg_bin(NULL){}
01366 
01367             /* Private methods: */
01368             /*------------------*/
01369 
01370             /* Returns the lowest-level bin containing the argument point: */
01371 
01372             bin_type* find_leaf(const point_type& x)
01373             {
01374                 return root_bin->find_point(x);
01375             }
01376 
01377             /* Returns the lowest-level bin containing the argument point and
01378              * sets the second argument to the corresponding left-integral: */
01379 
01380             bin_type* find_leaf(const point_type& x,value_type& s)
01381             {
01382                 s=(value_type)0;
01383                 return root_bin->find_point(x,s);
01384             }
01385 
01386             /* Registers a subgrid: */
01387 
01388             void register_sub_grid(parni_sub_grid<value_t,1,rng_t,key_t>* subgrid)
01389             {
01390                 if(subgrid->grid==this)
01391                 {
01392                     subgrids.insert(subgrid);
01393                 }
01394             }
01395 
01396             /* Unregisters a subgrid: */
01397 
01398             void unregister_sub_grid(parni_sub_grid<value_t,1,rng_t,key_t>* subgrid)
01399             {
01400                 if(subgrid->grid==this)
01401                 {
01402                     subgrids.erase(subgrid);
01403                 }
01404             }
01405     };
